get.summary: Finds table tableIds based on a search query
get.description: Step 1 request: Lists all tables with ID, but without statistics. Use this request to find relevant tables. If the user speaks another language than Norwegian, translate their request into English. Query formatting '(Residential AND Property) OR (Price AND Index)', remember to use ()

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Two letter language code (ISO 639). If an unsupported language code is provided, the default language (English) will be used.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Perform a free-text search for tables using an OR search logic. This search accepts multiple keywords and synonyms. For improved results, include both synonyms and the original search terms in the query parameters.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of tables returned per page. This parameter is used for pagination, with approximately 8000 tables available in total. Ensure the pageSize is not too large to avoid a 'ResponseTooLargeError'.

get.summary: Get valid variables and values for 'GetTableDataByPost', from a tabel with id: {id}.
get.description: Step 2 request: Used for listing all valid variables and values about a specific table. These variables and values are needed to generate a valid request to 'GetTableDataByPost'

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Two letter language code (ISO 639). If an unsupported language code is provided, the default language (English) will be used.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for each table. It consists of 5 numbers.

post.summary: Get data from table by id: {id}.
post.description: Step 3 request. Always query the 'getTables' first, then query 'GetValidVariablesAndValuesById', and at last query this request with the valid variabl and values.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Two letter language code (ISO 639). If an unsupported language code is provided, the default language (English) will be used.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for each table. It consists of 5 numbers.

parameters.name: outputFormat
parameters.description: Specify which output format you want the response in. Available formats are: csv2, json and xlsx.

items.description: Details of an individual selection criterion.

variableCode.description: The code of the variable to be selected.

valueCodes.description: An array of value codes to be included in the selection.

items.description: A specific code value within the variable's code list.
